title: $49 -- 'Sherlock Holmes': Tour Premiere in Toronto, Reg. $80
text:
Wednesday, Nov. 4 Thursday, Nov. 5 
The Globe and Mail calls Greg Kramer's adaption of the famous play written by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle a "hit production," and also stars James Maslow of "Big Time Rush" fame as Watson and Renee Olstead as Lady Irene St. John. The show, designed by Cirque du Soleil's James Lavoie, follows the famous investigator through the backstreets of London to solve a heinous crime. 'Sherlock Holmes': Tour Premiere in Toronto, $ $49
